subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=儲
|c=cyu5,cou5,cyu4,cyu1
|c_note=cyu5 - literary (common); cou5 - vernacular (common, “to store up; to save”); cyu4 - literary (prescribed); cyu1 - rare
|h=pfs=chhù
|mn=xm,twv:thú/qz:thîr/qz:thír/zz:thí/tw:tû/twv:thû
|mn-t=tu5
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,n
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|儲藏室|儲蓄:save, store, put aside, deposit (money)|儲存:save, store, put aside (objects)|儲水庫:storage tank for water, reservoir|儲君:heir to the throne|王儲|東儲|儲款|冬儲|儲積|儲蓄銀行|倉儲|強迫儲蓄|儲運|儲幣|儲蓄券|儲齡|儲蓄存款|家無斗儲|儲水量|儲油構造|儲胥|儲藏|儲訓|儲備幹部|儲存單位|儲備|儲備銀行|儲值票|廣儲司|皇儲|活儲|斗儲|才儲八斗|積儲|耐儲大蒜|邊儲|薪儲之費|郵政儲金|超儲}}
